Main sections
of our work

Approach:

We personalise and add value to everyone’s encounter with nature by truly understanding their needs and catering to each one of them, while promoting environmental awareness and the self-sufficiency of local communities.

Team:

We have well-trained and experienced teams of nature-loving enthusiasts and knowledgeable locals that regularly ensure that safety measures are in place for all TACTACK’s activities.

Experience:

We offer authentic, well-rounded and holistic outdoor experiences that simultaneously feature educational, therapeutic and recreational elements.

Execution:

We are meticulous in the planning and execution of our journeys, and consistently deliver well-organised and memorable experiences.

Our experiences

Pakistan is blessed with oscillating seasons that grant us the opportunity to witness nature in all its glory. With experiences in both the mountains and at sea, TACTACK organizes a myriad of year-round bespoke trips to cater to every season and every need.

EDUCATION

Intellectually enriching outdoor eco-tours for our future generation

Corporate

High-value engaging tours for the professional development and bonding of business executives

RECREATIONAL

High-value engaging tours for the professional development and bonding of business executives

Mission

To offer everyone the unique opportunity to connect with nature and engage with each other through authentic and meaningful interactions that empower local communities in Pakistan.

Vision

That Pakistan’s nature be recognised, loved and protected.

Our projects

RECOGNIZING THE VALUE OF NATURE

At TACTACK, we are strong advocates of Community Based Tourism. This strategy directly involves the residents of the destinations we travel to in our daily operations. This empowers them and nurtures in them a sense of responsibility, self-sufficiency and ownership, ultimately boosting the growth of their local economies. As such, all our customers positively contribute to the sustenance and betterment of the lives of these inhabitants.
